descriptionNullable:
### Context

The dataset – A Large-Scale News Dataset for Urdu Text Processing, to the best our knowledge, is the only available large-scale dataset on Urdu lan- guage for many NLP, Machine/Deep Learning tasks: text processing, classification, summarization, Named Entity Recognition, Topic Modeling, and Text Generation.

### Content

This dataset offers above 1 Million Urdu news stories text corpus for four distinct categories: Business & Economics, Science & Technology, Entertain- ment, and Sports. These four distinct categories are appropriately chosen to elim- inate any ambiguity therefore this dataset is suitable for many Urdu NLP tasks.

### Acknowledgements

Hussain, Khalid; Mughal, Nimra; Ali, Irfan; Hassan, Saif; Daudpota, Sher Muhammad (2021), “Urdu News Dataset 1M”, Mendeley Data, V3, doi: 10.17632/834vsxnb99.3
title: Urdu News Dataset
subtitle: 1 Million Urdu News Stories Corpus
